attributes.action: .Include the teaching of Spanish and Portuguese in the school curriculum.
attributes.additional_details:
Include in the curriculum of public schools in regions where there are many speakers of Portuguese and Spanish, the teaching of Portuguese and Spanish languages, to promote students' language skills.

*The United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland (UKGBNI) is an observer member of the Portuguese-speaking community.
attributes.background: Include the teaching of Spanish and Portuguese in the school curriculum, in regions where there are many immigrants or speakers of these languages.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

It is for individual schools to decide which languages they teach as part of their curriculum.
